answers.answer: Not everyone looses the mucus plug sometimes it doesnt come out till labir begins. So dont be sad :)
Im on #3 and I never lost it before labor! Ive lost little bits earlier in pregnancy and its pretty gross.lol good luck with your induction!
Wow so exciting. .! Iv 10 more weeks to go until I meet my little man.Wish u all the best for tomorrow. X
I didnt lose my muscus plug until i was at the hospital in labor.

question: Im really sad i havent lost my mucous plug.. im dialated almost to a 3, @37 weeks. Being induced tomorrow at 5 if i havent made progress.. due to preeclampsia.. but im sad i didnt lose it. Lol. But sooooo excited to hold my baby boy. Bentley, mommies ready. Get out.
title: sad..
